author: Staff Reporter
text:
The body of an anti-social Suresh alias Gunda Suresh (38) was found in an isolated place near Ozhiginaseri bridge on Saturday.

It was alleged that Suresh was kidnapped by a four-member in an auto on Friday from his residence on Kannimar Mettu Street in Vadasri on Friday.

As his family members couldn’t reach him over his mobile, his mother Kanni Mariyal lodged a complaint with the Vadaseri police.

Superintendent of Police G. Dharmaraj rushed to the place of crime. Police suspect that the murder could be a revenge from his rivals.

Several cases were pending against Suresh in different police stations in the district.
title: History-sheeter murdered
